thread.title: Chikatara, Salami On Target As Home Eagles Spank PH Team
thread.title_full: Chikatara, Salami On Target As Home Eagles Spank PH Team

author: Prince Imehiron
title: Chikatara, Salami On Target As Home Eagles Spank PH Team
text:
Headlines / Chikatara, Salami On Target As Home Eagles Spank PH Team Chikatara, Salami On Target As Home Eagles Spank PH Team 
By Adeboye Amosu: 
The home-based Super Eagles beat Blessed Academy of Port Harcourt 6-2 in a test game on Thursday. 
Late invitee, Chisom Chikatara, struck twice in the game with Gbolahan Salami, Tunde Adeniji and Osas Okoro also on the score sheet. 
Salami who netted a brace in Sunshine Stars' 3-0 win against last weekend opened scoring for the Eagles in the eighth minute. 
Adeniji increased the Eagles lead seven minutes before the break with Chikatara getting the third after resumption. Rangers midfielder Okoro scored the fourth with Blessed Academy reducing the deficit few minutes later. 
Chikatara netted his second of the day in the closing stage of the game, with Ezekiel Bassey scoring the sixth goal for the Eagles. 
Blessed Academy pulled one back after Bassey's goal. 
The Eagles are preparing for the Africa Nations Championship qualifier against Burkina Faso next week.
